headline: Truist Raises Price Target on Amphenol Corporation (APH) After CommScope Deal
summary: Amphenol Corporation (NYSE:APH) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On January 13, Truist Securities analyst William S. Stein raised the price target on the stock to $182 from $180 and kept a “Buy” rating on the shares. The rating follows closure of Amphenol’s acquisition of CommScope’s Connectivity and Cable […]
